text: I have an HubSpot Email Template which i am sending using Single Send API,but for "from" and "to" addresses rather than assigning values,
i want it to be dynamic like for example: toEmail = "<mailto:amit@gmail.com|amit@gmail.com>" and this will replace here "to": "toEmail"
how can i achieve this dynamic values for "to" and "from" address

Hey <@U066ZDULL6M>, you can use the UI on the import section to get a import log, and download the error file. This will get you more details on the errors on your import and the reason the records were not imported.
<@U04C7B6FQ10> Right, I did utilize the logs ui and it was not very helpful the import itself is successful and so is the get request, so they do not provide any information on my error.

Hey everyone, this thought just popped in my head, is there a place where I can check out how does stuff need to be formatted for HubSpot to apply the value? What I mean is that for example on javascript multiple checkboxes have to be separated by ";".

Hi Guys, I have a problem with a client’s website. The search results API returns null pages to the homepage.
The url returned are like:
`/40300769342`
There is no Dynamic Pages set to that page.
